page.title: 08Garden Fete June'85:Gringley
page.content:
{Hightlighted words explained on page 9
The annual garden fete was once again held at'The Homestead',Gringley,which belongs to Mr&Mrs C.Thomson.The first event was a children's fancy dress competition judged by Miss J.Towler, JP.:Miss Laura Bradshaw received First Prize for appearance as "Supergran".Mr P.Tallents & Mr R.Greenham,the churchwardens,presented posies to Miss Towler & Mr & Mrs C. Thomson. Stalls included:cakes (Mrs H.Thomson, Mrs A. Morley),produce (Mrs E.Greenham,Mrs M. Dykes),bottles (Mrs I.Rennison, Miss C.Rennison),{white elephant}(Mr R.Winter, Mrs J.Winter).Mrs J.Parsons, Mrs E.Kewarth,Mrs K.Jenkinson & Miss S Baker prepared & served refreshments. Sideshows included:{"Catch the Rat" (Mr.C.Sisum);{"Sticky golf"};(Mr P. Tallents);quoits (Mr G.Jackson);P.T.O.
